entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow and ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
